bill_title: establish deadlines for the Bureau of Finance and Management to respond to certain information requests by the Legislature.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish deadlines for the Bureau of Finance and Management to respond to certain information requests by the Legislature. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 4-7-15 be amended to read as follows: 4-7-15. The Bureau of Finance and Management, at the direction and under the control of the Governor, and subject to the provisions of this chapter, shall develop financial policies and plans as the basis for budget recommendations to the Legislature, and prepare detailed documents in accordance with such financial policies and plans for presentation to the Legislature. The Bureau of Finance and Management shall make its records and information available at all times to the Legislature and its designees or an individual legislator. The Bureau of Finance and Management shall respond to any request by the Legislature or an individual legislator for such information within three business days and shall provide the information within seven business days after the request was made. If the Bureau of Finance and Management fails to respond or provide the information within the times specified in this section, the bureau is in contempt of the Legislature . 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
